movies.title: Loving
movies.plot: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, an interracial couple, whose challenge of their anti-miscegenation arrest for their marriage in Virginia led to a legal battle that would end at the US Supreme Court.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 85 nominations.

events.title: Richard Loving and Mildred Jeter marry
police raid Richard and Mildred Loving's home
Richard and Mildred Loving plead guilty
the Supreme Court rules that interracial marriage is legal

movies.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
movies.plot: An award-winning cynical journalist, Lloyd Vogel, begrudgingly accepts an assignment to write an Esquire profile piece on the beloved television icon Fred Rogers. After his encounter with Rogers, Vogel's perspective on life is transformed.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 57 nominations.

events.title: "Can You Say ... Hero?", an article about Fred Rogers, is published in Esquire magazine
